definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: wail, lament (NH id.; Targum [[סְפַד]], ChrPalAram. spd id., Schwally:Idiot. 64; As. [sapâdu]], sipdu, sipittu, mourning, Dl:HWB 507; cf. Amhar. safade: dirge Prä:ZMG xxxv (1881), 762);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[וְסָֽפְדָה]] consec. Zec 12:12, 3 pl. [[וְסָֽפְדוּ]] consec. 1Ki 14:13, Zec 12:10; Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתִּסְפּׂד]] 2Sa 11:26, 2 ms. [[תִּסְפּׂד]] Ez Eze 24:16, 1 S. cohort. [[אֶסְפְּדָה]] Mic 1:8, 3 mpl. [[יִסְפְּדוּ]] Je 6:16 +, etc.; Imv. mpl. [[סִפְדוּ]] 2Sa 3:31 + 2 t.; fpl. [[סְפׂ֫דְנׇה]] Je 49:3; Inf. abs. [[סָפוֹד]] Zec 7:5; cstr. [[סְפוֹד]] Ec 3:4, [[לִסְפּׂד]] Ge 23:2, 1Ki 13:29, [[לִסְפּוֹד]] Je 16:5; Pt. act. pl. [[סׂפְדִים]] Is 32:12, ´[[סוֹ]] Ec 12:5; —wail, lament (with loud cries, etc., v. Mic 1:8, and cf. Dr:Am 5, 16), esp. for dead, c. [[לְ]], 1Sa 25:1, 1Sa 28:3, 1Ki 14:13, 1Ki 14:18, Ge 23:2 (P) Je 16:6, Je 22:18, Je 22:18, Je 34:5, cf. [[וְאַל־תֵּלֵח לִסְפּוֹד וְאַל־תָּנׁד לָהֶם]] Je 16:5; c. [[עַל־]] over 2Sa 1:12, 2Sa 11:26, 1Ki 13:30, cf. Zec 12:10 (see v:Zec 12:12 infr.); c. [[לִפְנֵי]] i.e. marching before (bier) 2Sa 3:31 (v. Dr); c. acc. cogn. Ge 50:10 (J); abs. 1Ki 13:29, Ez Eze 24:16 cf. v:Eze 24:23, Ec 3:4 (opp. [[רקד]]; cf. Ps 30:12), and pt. as subst. Ec 12:5 wailers; also, with idea of guilt on part of those wailing, Zec 12:12 (cf. v:Zec 12:10 supr.); over calamity, judgment, c. [[עַל־]] Mic 1:8, abs. Je 4:8 (both + [[הֵילִיל]]), Je 49:3 and (with fasting) Zec 7:5, Joe 1:13.—´[[עַל־שָׁדַיִם סׂפְדִים עַל־שְׂדֵי־חֶמֶד וגו]] Is 32:12 is dub.; Thes Ew De Che al. upon the breasts smiting (?) for the fields, etc., but rd. prob. [[שָׂדִים]] ([[־וֹת]], [[יִם]]—[[ַ]]) Ges:Comm. (q. v.) Buhl:Lex 13 Skinner al.: over the fields wailing, over the delightful fields, etc.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[לאׁ יִסָּֽפְדוּ]] Je 16:4 they shall not be bewailed, so Je 25:33.
